snippet: GigaOM, a technology media company, has acquired ContentNext Media, the parent company of paidContent, from Guardian News and Media Ltd., amid continuing industry consolidation.
abstract: GigaOM, a technology media company, has acquired ContentNext Media, the parent company of paidContent, from Guardian News and Media Ltd., amid continuing industry consolidation.
lead_paragraph: GigaOM, a technology media company, has acquired ContentNext Media, the parent company of paidContent, from Guardian News and Media, for an undisclosed sum, amid an industry consolidation.
